item.title: Hey!
item.description: All of this is quite neat, I’m having a lot of fun! I’ve taken a couple classes in Python, and I’ve taken a couple of classes in R, but I didn’t know you could get them to work together! Here is some code in R: library(reticulate) this <- "We can" Here is some code in Python: that = "print stuff like this" print(r.this,that) ## We can print stuff like this How neat is that!
